Ananya Panday smiles as she is snapped a.content: A close friend of the two confirmed their break up to the news publication and said, "They broke up almost a month ago.‚ÄùAditya and Ananya have been dating for almost two years.Ananya's appearance comes a day after a news report claimed she had broken up with actor Aditya Roy Kapoor.The two were recently seen at the premiere of Heeramandi, although they made separate entry to the event.

Exclusive: India's oldest fusion band In.content: Known for being one of the most eclectic music bands in India, Indian Ocean recently performed again at the Dublin Square in Mumbai.The beauty of the Indian audiences is that they have always shown interest in new kinds of music and sounds and have always welcomed people with new ideas.Q: Indian Ocean started fusion music when most didn‚Äôt understand what it meant.A: I think the secret is that we love and respect the music that all of us do and the people we play with.

Pankaj Tripathi's international film Man.content: The award-winning international film is helmed by American director John Upchurch.The film will get its India¬†release on May 16 and it will release on the OTT platform, Open Theatre.Pankaj Tripathi starrer Mango Dreams will finally be released in India after travelling to a series of film festivals.The film earned him the Best Actor Award at the Capetown International Film Market and Festival in 2017.

Love and respect I get second only to Am.content: The video of her speech has since gone viral and has led to multiple comments on social media with many making sarcastic jibes about her comparison to one of Bollywood‚Äôs most revered icons, despite her recent string of box office failures.Bollywood star-turned-politician Kangana Ranaut¬†compared herself to Indian icon Amitabh Bachchan during her recent speech while campaigning for the Lok Sabha Elections 2024.The actress, who is contesting on a Bhartiya Janata Party (BJP) ticket from the Mandi constituency of Himachal Pradesh, has likened herself to Big B which has led to considerable chatter on the internet.

Kareena Kapoor has the cheekiest comment.content: Saif and Amrita share two children, daughter Sara Ali Khan and son Ibrahim Ali Khan.Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan's eldest son Ibrahim Ali Khan also reached the venue as the Puma brand ambassador.While sharing some pictures of his first meeting with the Monacan motorsports racing driver, Ibrahim wrote, "I know, even Charles confused me for a Ferrari driver (emojis) @charles_leclerc @pumaindia.At the Grand Prix, Ibrahim met racing star Charles LeClerc, who confused the star kid for a Ferrari driver.

Pavail Gulati to reunite with Saiyami Kh.content: "¬†¬†A source closer to the series expressed enthusiasm about the possibility of reuniting with the talented cast, adding, "The chemistry between Pavail and Saiyami was a highlight of the first season, and we would love to explore their dynamic further in a potential sequel.Following the resounding success of the first season of the gripping series Faadu, rumours are swirling around the potential involvement of acclaimed actor Pavail Gulati in its highly anticipated sequel.In response to inquiries about his potential involvement in the sequel, Pavail remained tight-lipped, stating, "I am humbled by the love and support we received for Faadu.I‚Äôm sure we can bring the magic of season 1 to the story to take it forward from where it was left off earlier.

No bra, tiniest thong and bedsheet! Doja.content: American singer and rapper Doja Cat, who loves to stir pots every now and then, is taking social media by storm, all because of her bold look for a quick shopping spree with her new beau¬†Brett Nelson.Viral photos show the singer walking across the streets wearing just a thong and a bedsheet, which she wrapped around her body like a cover dress.Several viral photos and videos from the show caught Doja smoking inside the Met Gala venue, which is strictly prohibited.Flaunting the obnoxiously revealing look, Doja reached McDonald's in New York City for a quick meal.

Met Gala 2024: Indian philanthropist Sud.content: She is among the few Indians we will see at the Met Gala red carpet this year.Hyderabad-based philanthropist and businesswoman Sudha Reddy has partnered with the Metropolitan Museum of Art and will be walking the red carpet.Apart from the collaboration, Sudha will also grace the red carpet.Sudha was first seen on the Met Gala red carpet in 2021 when she wore a stunning custom ¬†Falguni Shane Peacock.

Madonna's free concert in Rio attended b.content: It felt like the whole city turned up as Madonna put on a free concert in Brazil‚Äôs Rio de Janeiro.‚Äù¬†Madonna‚Äôs concert in Rio is part of her Celebration Tour, marking¬†her 40 years in music.Eighteen sound towers were set up on the beach to make sure that all¬† concertgoers were able to hear Madonna, the news agency said in a report.Madonna teased fans with a preview before the concert.

Karan Johar slams Kettan Singh and Madne.content: His note read, "I was sitting and watching television with my mom‚Ä¶ and saw a promo of a reality comedy show on a supposedly respectable channel‚Ä¶ a comic was mimicking me in exceptionally poor taste‚Ä¶ I expect this from trolls and faceless and nameless people but when your own industry can disrespect someone who has been in the business for over 25 years it speaks volumes about the times we live in‚Ä¶ this doesn‚Äôt even anger me it just makes me sad!He clarified that he wanted to entertain the audience and not hurt anyone.First of all, whatever impersonation I do because I watch a lot of Karan Johar on the coffee show, I am a fan of his work.I am a huge fan of his work and his show.

Kim Kardashian faces loud boos at.content: " A third user said, "Kim Kardashian getting publicly booed at Tom Brady‚Äôs roast is one of the greatest things to ever happen ever."Kim Kardashian getting publicly booed at Tom Brady‚Äôs roast is one of the greatest things to ever happen ever.The makeup mogul reached the stage to roast and ridicule Tom Brady but she herself ended up getting roasted by the audience.com/G831U3LcfjKim Kardashian received tons of boo‚Äôs when she got up on the stage at the Tom Brady roast üò≥üò≥pic.

Rana Daggubati says Kalki 2898 AD will g.content: The film will be release in Hindi and Telugu, along with dubbed versions in Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, and English.Not just us but actor Rana Daggubati is also excited for the much-anticipated release of Nag Ashwin's sci-fi action-thriller, Kalki 2898 AD.Directed by Nag Ashwin, the film is inspired by Hindu mythology and is set in a post-apocalyptic world in 2898 AD.I am really looking forward to that film and it could really become a global film from Telugu (cinema).

Kareena Kapoor Khan opens up about Crew'.content: The actor, a passionate advocate of child rights, education and health, said she is looking forward to utilising her reach as a celebrity to help in her role as UNICEF India's National Ambassador.The box office success of her latest release Crew is a sign that there is no gender bias today, says actor Kareena Kapoor Khan, who is happy the heist comedy has 'broken barriers' when it comes to films fronted by women.Going forward, Kareena said she will continue to associate herself with projects that "break norms"."Through UNICEF, I have grown from the person I was 10 years ago to what I am today as a National Ambassador...

Bernard Hill, Titanic and Lord of the Ri.content: Hollywood actor Bernard Hill is no more.RIP Bernard Hill, who left us with some great performances, not least the legendary Yosser Hughes in Boys From The Blackstuff.''It‚Äôs with great sadness that I note the death of Bernard Hill.Mourning Hill's death, Dickson wrote on X: ''It‚Äôs with great sadness that I note the death of Bernard Hill.

Prince William and Kate Middleton ‚Äògoi.content: ''Arrieta, who loves designing for the couple's three children ‚Äî Prince George, 10, Princess Charlotte, 9, and Prince Louis, 6 ‚Äî said, "Dressing the royals gives me so much pride, I really do care about how they look."William and Kate's designer friend Amaia Arrieta, said in an interview with the Telegraph that the couple, are ''going through hell.Dressing the royals gives me so much pride, I really do care about how they look."Talking about dressing the royal children, the Spanish-born designer, who works with Maria Teresa Turrion Borrallo, the nanny of three children, said.

Kareena Kapoor Khan says Singham Again i.content: In the movie, the Piku star will play the role of Shakti Shetty.Furthermore, in the upcoming¬†movie, she will play the role of Ajay's wife.In the movie that is loaded with a male-star cast, Kareena has revealed, that both her and Deepika's characters play pivotal roles in the third movie of the Singham franchise.‚ÄùDirected by Shetty, the film boasts a star-studded cast including Ajay Devgn, who will reprise the role of Bajirao Singham.

Megalopolis: Teaser, cast, synopsis and.content: The City of New Rome must change, causing conflict between Cesar Catilina (Adam Driver), a genius artist who seeks to leap into a utopian, idealistic future, and his opposition, Mayor Franklyn Cicero (Giancarlo Esposito), who remains committed to a regressive status quo, perpetuating greed, special interests, and partisan warfare.In the first short clip from the movie, Adam who is an architect is standing on the edge of a high-rise building, as we see him jump-off¬†the building.Starring prolific actor Adam Driver, the movie is set to premiere at the Cannes Film Festival this year.On Saturday (May 4), the first teaser of the movie was released, and after watching the short clip from the movie, we can surely say that another classic piece from the director is on the way.

Alia Bhatt to attend Met Gala 2024 after.content: This year, the Raazi star will be one of the few Indian celebrities who will be part of the Met Gala fashion parade.The whole world is gearing up for the Met Gala 2024, and this year, Bollywood actress Alia Bhatt will be at the MET Gala, as per Indian news channel India Today.Last year, Alia channelled her inner princess at The Metropolitan Museum of Art as she walked at the iconic stairs wearing a custom Prabal Gurung ball gown made of pearls for the Met Gala theme 'Karl Lagerfeld: A Line of Beauty', which was a homage to the legendary fashion designer.I‚Äôm definitely not attending this year because I‚Äôm filming, but I think I really do enjoy watching people's creativity during the Met Gala and I am really excited to see how it will turn out.

Amitabh Bachchan completes work on Rajin.content: Bachchan, who last worked with Rajinikanth in the 1991 film Hum, shared the update on the project on his personal blog on Saturday.But ever the dissatisfaction of a doubt, when in reflection, whether the work done was to satisfaction and whether there shall be an opportunity to have another try to redo and maybe improve the previous.Megastar Amitabh Bachchan says he has finished shooting for Tamil film Vettaiyan, fronted by Rajinikanth."Another day at work comes to an end and the end too of this project, for me.
